thread.title: BRIEF-American Renal Associates Holdings Announces Launch Of Secondary Public Offering Of Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-American Renal Associates Holdings Announces Launch Of Secondary Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: renal associates holdings announces launch of secondary public offering of common stock march 26

text:
March 26 (Reuters) - American Renal Associates Holdings Inc :
* AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES HOLDINGS, INC. ANNOUNCES LAUNCH OF SECONDARY PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK
* AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES - LAUNCHES PUBLIC OFFERING OF 5 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK BY CERTAIN STOCKHOLDERS
* AMERICAN RENAL ASSOCIATES - SELLING STOCKHOLDERS, INCLUDES CENTERBRIDGE CAPITAL PARTNERS LP & CERTAIN OF ITS AFFILIATES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
